name: Santa Fun Games
description:
#1 Game in the Cayman Islands App Store
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Santa and all his friends at the North Pole have come together and helped us here at Apptronics to build their favourite games for all the good boys and girls out there to play!

Have fun and see if you can beat the games that Santa and all his friends play everyday!

Oh, and one more thing….

Merry Christmas Everyone!

Features:
• 9 exciting games designed uniquely for Christmas!
• New story adventures, every week, from Ollie, Emilie and everyone!
• Free-flowing scrolling screen for game selection.
• New updates coming all year round!
• Classic Christmas songs sung throughout, but with a twist!
• Facebook and Twitter options available, like and follow us for updates!

-Sweet Smash
~~~~~~~~~~~
Make big chain combo’s of cookies, candy canes, cupcakes and more!
Use new recipes to create yummy new sweets, and make even more matches.
Are you ready for delicious Chunky Choc Cookies, Sticky Sweet Canes and Fluffy Cloud Cakes?

-Flappy Reindeer
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Soar through the sky, jumping over obstacles, and ducking away from their sharp pointy edges. Guide Rudolph through them all, to safety! He can’t make it back on his own, he needs your help to get back home in time for Christmas!

-Santa's Slingshot
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Santa's best elf, Ollie, can't wrap all the presents by himself. He needs your help to aim the slingshot and land the toys in the right boxes!

-Snow Shooter
~~~~~~~~~~~
Ready! Aim! Fire!
Send snowballs soaring through the air, ready to smash through their targets!

-Catch Santa
~~~~~~~~~~~
Catch Santa as quickly as you can before time runs out!

-Find Santa’s Path
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Follow the footsteps all the way until you find Santa!

-Matching Pairs
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Find Santa’s hidden pictures and match them all up!

-Santa’s Cookies
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tilt your Christmas sack back and forth to catch cookies for Santa on his journey!

-Present Drop
~~~~~~~~~~~~
Help Santa to deliver all of the presents to the good boys and girls!

-Santa Fun Stories
~~~~~~~~~~~~
Every week, there’s a new story from up in the North Pole!
Join Ollie, Emilie, Santa, Mama, Rudolph and Snowy, and read all about their adventures!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Please rate and comment if you enjoy Santa Fun Games and want to see updates!

Also! Send us any comments on Facebook or Twitter about what you’d like to see in any new updates!

Merry Christmas to all you boys and girls!
